function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clear communication about policies & protocols leading to confusion and non-compliance.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread, decreased morale, and decreased productivity.","Mitigation":"Regular and transparent communication of policies, protocols, and updates; training on health and safety measures.","Technologies":"Internal communication platforms, video conferencing tools, and health monitoring apps.","People":"All employees, especially those working on-site or in close proximity to others.","Owner":"Management and HR team."},{"Description":"Feelings of loneliness and gratitude among employees affecting mental health and well-being.","Impact":"Decreased motivation, increased stress, and potential impact on immune system.","Mitigation":"Regular check-ins, mental health support programs, and team-building activities.","Technologies":"Collaboration tools, mental health apps, and virtual team-building platforms.","People":"All employees, particularly those working remotely or in self-isolation.","Owner":"Leadership and HR team."},{"Description":"Lack of empowerment and support for on-the-ground teams to find solutions for crisis management.","Impact":"Decreased innovation, missed opportunities for improvement, and reduced resilience in the face of crisis.","Mitigation":"Empowerment through decision-making authority, training on problem-solving, and recognition of contributions.","Technologies":"Project management tools, collaborative platforms, and knowledge-sharing systems.","People":"Teams working on-site and in the field.","Owner":"Management and team leaders."}]}
